title: Himi 244
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Sīsū fakafeta’i,
‘I ho anga’ofa;
I he’emau ma’u ni,
‘Emau fakataha
Ko koe pē, ’Eiki Sīsū
‘Oku mau kei mo’ui ai.
2.
Kuo mau kātoa,
‘I ho finangalo,
Ke fai ‘emau lotu,
Ki he ‘Afiona;
Pea ka mau ka tutuku,
Ke tau tutuku mo koe.
3.
Ke mau ‘alu ma’u pē,
‘I he hala lelei,
Ke mau hoko atu,
Ki he maama lelei,
‘I ho’o fa’a tokoni mai,
‘Eiki, ‘i he’emau vaivai.
4.
Ke tau ‘amanaki,
Ki he fakataha
‘O e kakai tui,
‘I he katoanga,
‘I he maama ‘i ‘olunga,
Ko hotau mālōlō’anga.
5.
‘E fiemālie,
Hotau laumālie,
Pea fai ma’u ai pē,
‘Etau fiefia;
Pea fe’ofo’ofani
‘I he ‘ao, ‘o e ‘Eiki. *
